name: ManyChat, Inc.
description: Developer of chatbot software designed to simplify the process of engaging an audience. The company's software offers a visual interface that implements coding-free instructions on how to create a bot within a few minutes and helps to broadcast messages to subscribers, create scheduled messages, auto-post from social media applications, and automate replies based on keywords as well as engage with interactive messages, enabling businesses to do marketing, sales and grow their ROI and revenue.
one_liner: Developer of chatbot software designed to simplify the process of engaging an audience. The company's software offers a visual interface that implements coding-free instructions on how to create a bot within a few minutes and helps to broadcast messages to subscribers, create scheduled messages, auto-post from social media applications, and automate replies based on keywords as well as engage with interactive messages, enabling businesses to do marketing, sales and grow their ROI and revenue.
